summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Multifamily Property Tax Exemption Program, amending Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 5.72.030 to add Capitol Hill and Rainier Beach to the residential target areas eligible for property tax exemption, amending 5.72.040 to revise the criteria for project eligibility with respect to affordable units, and adding a new subsection 5.72.065 to establish a procedure and fee for the consideration of contract amendments requested by project applicants.
